results.title: Comparison between a sustained administration of carvedilol versus atenolol to reduce restenosis after coronary stenting.
results.text_hl: Comparison between a sustained administration of @CHEMICAL_Carvedilol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077261 @@@carvedilol@@@ versus @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ to reduce @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Restenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D023903 @@@restenosis@@@ after coronary stenting.

citations.NLM: Cha KS, Kim MH, Kim JW, Kim DI, Kim HJ, Kim DS, Kim JS. Comparison between a sustained administration of carvedilol versus atenolol to reduce restenosis after coronary stenting. Am Heart J. 2004 Feb;147(2):E7. PMID: 14760341
citations.BibTeX: @article{14760341, title={Comparison between a sustained administration of carvedilol versus atenolol to reduce restenosis after coronary stenting.}, author={Cha KS and Kim MH and Kim JW and Kim DI and Kim HJ and Kim DS and Kim JS}, journal={Am Heart J}, volume={147}, number={2}, pages={E7}}

results.title: Treatment of hypertension in peripheral arterial disease.
results.text_hl: A trial comparing the @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ antagonist @CHEMICAL_Verapamil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014700 @@@verapamil@@@ versus placebo in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ undergoing angioplasty (n = 96) suggested that @CHEMICAL_Verapamil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014700 @@@verapamil@@@ reduced @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Restenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D023903 @@@restenosis@@@ (per cent diameter @DISEASE_Constriction_Pathologic @DISEASE_MESH:D003251 @@@stenosis@@@ (+- SD) 48.0% +- 11.5 versus 69.6% +- 12.2; P < 0.01), although this was not reflected in the maintenance of a high ABI (0.76 +- 0.10 versus 0.72 +- 0.08 for @CHEMICAL_Verapamil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014700 @@@verapamil@@@ versus placebo).

citations.NLM: Lane DA, Lip GY. Treatment of hypertension in peripheral arterial disease. Cochrane Database Syst Rev. 2013 Dec 4;(12):CD003075. PMID: 24307487
citations.BibTeX: @article{24307487, title={Treatment of hypertension in peripheral arterial disease.}, author={Lane DA and Lip GY}, journal={Cochrane Database Syst Rev}, number={12}, pages={CD003075}}
